summary: When user asks 'How much did I spend on groceries last week?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: transaction analysis.
When user asks 'What's my checking account balance?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: account balance query.
When user asks 'Show me my spending by category this month', route to finance_agent. Rationale: category aggregation.
When user asks 'How much did I spend at McDonald's in the last 6 months?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: merchant filter over time window.
When user asks 'What's my net worth?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Net worth calculation from current assets/liabilities (MANDATORY tool).
When user asks 'Show my net worth trend over time', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Historical net worth analysis.
When user asks 'What's my average monthly income?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Historical income analysis.
When user asks 'Which of my debts has the highest interest rate?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Liability/Account analysis.
When user asks 'Compare my spending this month vs last month', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Period comparison analysis.
When user asks 'What's my overall financial health?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: multi-metric analysis.
When user asks 'What's my debt-to-income ratio?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: DTI computation.
When user asks 'How are my spending trends this year?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: YTD trend analysis.
When user asks 'How much did I pay in taxes last year?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Tax category historical analysis.
User says 'I want to log an expense' or 'Add an income' or 'Record a transaction' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Starting the manual capture flow (generic).
User says 'Add a new asset' or 'I want to log an asset' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Starting the asset capture flow (generic).
User says 'Record a liability' or 'I have a new debt to log' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Starting the liability capture flow (generic).
User says 'Log a manual expense: $23 coffee at Blue Bottle today' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction (expense) capture with merchant and date.
User says 'Record income I got today: $500 from freelance' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction (income) capture.
User says 'Add a cash expense 40 USD for groceries last Friday' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual expense capture with date.
User says 'Add a new asset: Tesla Model 3 worth $22,000' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: asset capture with name and amount.
User says 'Record my house as an asset, estimated value 420k USD' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: real estate asset capture.
User says 'Add a liability: student loan balance is 12,500 USD' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: liability capture with principal balance.
User says 'Add my mortgage with principal 250,000' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Mortgage liability capture.
User says 'Update the balance on my student loan to $10,000' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Liability modification.
User says 'Delete the Tesla asset' or 'Remove the manual expense I just added' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Deletion/Removal of captured items.
User says 'I want to save $1000 for vacation by July 1st' -> route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal creation with details.
User says 'Create a goal' or 'Set up a savings goal' or 'I want to start a new goal' -> route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal creation action command.
When user asks 'Can I change my savings goal to $1500?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal modification.
When user asks 'Delete my vacation goal' or 'Remove my savings goal', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal deletion action.
When user asks 'How am I doing with my savings goal?' or 'Am I on track?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal status/progress.
When user asks 'Show my goal progress history for the last 3 months', route to goal_agent. Rationale: Goal history analysis (dedicated tool).
User says 'Track my gym visits 3x per week' or 'I want to meditate daily', route to goal_agent. Rationale: Non-financial habit goal creation.
When user asks 'How many times did I go to the gym this week?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: Non-financial goal progress status.
When user asks 'How do I build good credit?' or 'What is a credit score?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: General financial education.
When user says 'I don't know how to budget. Where do I start?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Budgeting education and guidance.
When user asks 'Where can I find my memories?' or 'How do I manage memories?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: App navigation and feature explanation.
When user asks 'Where is the goals section?' or 'How do I navigate to goals?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: App navigation guidance.
When user asks 'Where do I find the Reports?' or 'What is the Cash Flow report?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Navigation to reports or report definitions.
When user asks 'Where is my profile?' or 'How do I change my nickname?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Navigation to profile/settings.
When user asks 'How do I connect my bank accounts?' or 'Where is the Financial Info menu?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: App setup and navigation guidance.
When user asks 'What can you do?' or 'What are your features?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: App capabilities explanation (MANDATORY).
When user asks 'Who is Vera?' or 'Who made you?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: AI identity and Verde attribution info.
When user asks 'What are your ethics?' or 'How do you use my data?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Privacy, security, and ethical principles.
When user asks 'What is Plaid?' or 'Is it secure to link my bank?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Technical and security FAQ.
When user asks 'How much does Vera cost?' or 'What is the free trial?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Subscription and pricing info.
When user asks 'How do I cancel my subscription?' or 'How to upgrade?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Billing and subscription management guidance.
When user asks for help with government assistance (SNAP, SSI) or federal benefits (Benefits.gov), route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Guidance to external assistance resources.
When user asks for help with housing, rent, or foreclosure prevention (HUD), route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Guidance to external housing resources.
When user asks for mental health help or crisis resources (988, SAMHSA), route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Guidance to external support resources.
When user asks for help with debt collection rights, credit disputes, or scams (FTC, CFPB), route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Guidance to external legal/consumer rights.
When user asks about specific investment vehicles (I Bonds, 529 plans, RMDs), route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Educational info on external financial instruments.
When user asks for free financial tools or career resources (CareerOneStop, 211.org), route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Guidance to external educational/career tools.
When user asks about Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC) or IRS tax credits, route to wealth_agent. Rationale: External tax benefit information.
When user asks 'Can I link a 401k or retirement account?' or 'Does Vera support HSA connection?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Account type support guidance.
When user asks 'Show my cash flow' or 'What's my cash flow this month?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Income vs expense report (MANDATORY tool).
When user asks 'Income vs expenses last month' or 'How much did I earn vs spend last month?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Income vs expense report (MANDATORY tool).
When user asks 'What's my savings rate?' or 'What percent of my income did I save?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Derived metric from income/expense report.
When user asks 'Break down my expenses for the last 30 days' or 'Show an expense breakdown this month', route to finance_agent. Rationale: Expense breakdown from income/expense report.
User says 'I want to add an expense and an income' or 'Log an expense and income' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Multi-item manual transaction capture in one message.
User says 'Log a refund' or 'I got refunded $20' -> route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: Manual transaction capture (refund/income adjustment).
When user asks 'How can I reset my password?' or 'I forgot my password', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Account access and password reset guidance.
When user asks 'Which languages does Vera support?' or 'How do I change the app language?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: Language settings and supported languages guidance.
